statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 9 \\ -8 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
